00009 /**
00010  * systemwide locking mechanism with timeout for critical sections or eventhandlers
00011  *
00012  * @package kata_utility
00013  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00014  * @author sven.bender@gameforge.de
00015  */
00016 class LockUtility {
00017     /**
00018      * @var integer seconds to wait until we timeout
00019      */
00020     private $timeout= 10;
00021 
00022     /**
00023      * @var array holds lock-status
00024      */
00025     private $locks= array ();
00026 
00027     /**
00028      * @param integer $timout how many seconds to wait for a lock before we fail
00029      */
00030     public function setTimeout($timeout) {
00031         if (is_numeric($timeout) && ($timeout > 0)) {
00032             $this->timeout= $timeout;
00033             return true;
00034         }
00035         return false;
00036     }
00037 
00038     /**
00039      * setup up session directory
00040      */
00041     function  __construct() {
00042         kataMakeTmpPath('sessions');
00043     }
00044 
00045     /**
00046      * Lock a user id
00047      *
00048      * @param int $id, id of the user to lock.
00049      * @param bool $waitForTimeout, wait for time out
00050      * @return bool, returns true if the user was locked
00051      */
00052     function lock($id, $waitForTimeout= true) {
00053         if (substr(PHP_OS, 0, 3) == 'WIN') {
00054             return true;
00055         }
00056 
00057         $this->garbageCollect();
00058 
00059         $timeout= time() + $this->timeout;
00060         $lockname= KATATMP.'sessions'.DS.'lockfile'.urlencode($id);
00061         $fplock= null;
00062 
00063         do {
00064             $fplock = fopen($lockname, "w+");
00065             if ($fplock) {
00066                 if (flock($fplock, LOCK_EX | LOCK_NB)) {
00067                     break;
00068                 }
00069                 if ($fplock) {
00070                     fclose($fplock);
00071                     $fplock= null;
00072                 }
00073             }
00074             usleep(100000);
00075         } while ((time() < $timeout) && $waitForTimeout);
00076 
00077         if ($fplock) {
00078             $this->locks[$id]= $fplock;
00079             return true;
00080         }
00081 
00082         return false;
00083     }
00084 
00085     /**
00086      * Unlock a user id
00087      *
00088      * @param int $id, id of the user to lock
00089      * @return true if the user was unlocked
00090      */
00091     function unlock($id) {
00092         if (substr(PHP_OS, 0, 3) == 'WIN') {
00093             return true;
00094         }
00095 
00096         if (!isset($this->locks[$id])) {
00097             if (DEBUG > 0) {
00098                 throw new Exception("entity $id not locked");
00099             }
00100             return false;
00101         }
00102 
00103         $fplock= $this->locks[$id];
00104         flock($fplock, LOCK_UN);
00105         fclose($fplock);
00106 
00107         @ unlink(KATATMP.'sessions'.DS.'lockfile'.urlencode($id));
00108         unset ($this->locks[$id]);
00109         return true;
00110     }
00111 
00112     /**
00113      * clean up leftover lockfiles
00114      *
00115      * @param bool $force collect now, even if propability is unmet
00116      */
00117     function garbageCollect($force = false) {
00118         if (defined('LOCKUTIL_NOGC') && (LOCKUTIL_NOGC)) {
00119             return;
00120         }
00121 
00122         if (rand(0,100) > 5) {
00123             if (!$force) {
00124                 return;
00125             }
00126         }
00127         
00128         $files = glob(KATATMP.'sessions'.DS.'lockfile*', GLOB_NOSORT);
00129         $maxAge = time()-100;
00130         foreach ($files as $file) {
00131             if (filemtime($file) < $maxAge) {
00132                 @unlink($file);
00133             }
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     /**
00138      * output a word of warning if we forgot to unlock some ids
00139      */
00140     function __destruct() {
00141         if (count($this->locks) > 0) {
00142             if (DEBUG > 0) {
00143                 foreach ($this->locks as $id=>$fp) {
00144                     $this->unlock($id);
00145                 }
00146                 writeLog("these locks have not been unlocked:".print_r($this->locks, true),KATA_ERROR);
00147             }
00148         }
00149     }
00150 
00151 }
